archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.2.3: The information security function should assist business functions (e.g. procurement and legal) in the definition of standard/contractual requirements for the identification and use of external suppliers.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
